headline: Co-founder & CTO at Flagright (YC W22)  | ex-Palantir, AWS

experiences.title: Co-Founder & CTO
experiences.description:
Flagright arms financial institutions with a flexible, no-code platform to prevent financial crime to comply with AML compliance regulations. Flagright customers quickly set up their infrastructure to prevent fraud and money laundering with our API-first solution that can be integrated in a week compared to 2-4 months industry benchmark of similar solutions. Product portfolio includes real-time transaction monitoring, customer risk scoring, merchant monitoring, case management, sanctions screening, and more.

We are hiring competent and motivated engineers to join the crew. DM if interested!

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Built no-code, real-time, multi-region automated deployment products at the world's most innovative cloud infrastructure provider

experiences.title: Full Stack Engineer
experiences.description: Building disruptive logistical software products in Europe's first digital freight-forwarder Forto(Formerly FreightHub GmbH). Joined as Engineer #20 at Series A stage, left after Series C that made Forto an Unicorn.

experiences.title: Full Stack Engineer
experiences.description: Developed a Big Data and AI based SaaS platform in a fast-moving early stage startup as Engineer #1. Setup the entire backend data infrastructure.

experiences.title: Forward Deployed Engineer
experiences.description: One of the first hires for Palantir India. Helped large organizations unlock value in their data, with cutting-edge data integration, data versioning and analytics. Worked on-site for Palantir's India and SEA based enterprise customers.

experiences.company: Ministry of Defense, Government of India
experiences.title: Software Development Contractor
experiences.description: Worked on software for large scale data processing and analytics for the Department of Defense Production (DDP),  Ministry of Defense, India - as an external contractor

experiences.title: Software Engineering Co-op
experiences.description: Large scale data analytics. Markdown Optimization.

experiences.title: Research Assistant
experiences.description: Large scale data analytics and text mining - in the Center for Knowledge Analytics and Ontological Engineering, PES University

accomplishment_projects.title: Empirical analysis of the Indian political ecosystem as an application of generic textual processing
accomplishment_projects.description:
· A cloud-based text analysis platform that enables the procurement, integration, storage, and analysis of large
text-based data sets from multiple sources or domains.
· Full implementation of the platform with end-to-end integration between multiple techonologies such as Python,
nltk, Node.js, Javascript and D3.js. Extensively used Machine learning and implemented custom Machine Learning
algorithms.
· Platform successfully applied to the Indian political domain.
· Selected to present in the International Conference in Digital Libraries(ICDL) 2016, was awarded a prize in best
paper award category

accomplishment_projects.title: Computer Assembler
accomplishment_projects.description:
Coded a fully-functional computer assembler based on a hypothetical machine. 
Language Used: C

accomplishment_projects.title: ConPaaS - a Platform as a Service from scratch
accomplishment_projects.description:
An implementation of Platform-as-a-Service Cloud model using LXC containers as a part of Cloud Computing( CS341 ) Course. The PaaS is built using Node.js and is made to run on Linux machines. The PaaS is now able to host node.js code along with MongoDB, essentially supporting the mean stack.

Multi-user deployment is supported with the maximum number of containers per user set to 3. Each user can create upto 3 containers that run the same Node.js server program. The requests are forwarded to the different in a round-robin fashion by the load balancer.

accomplishment_projects.title: Distributed columnar key value datastore
accomplishment_projects.description:
A demonstration of the implementation of a distributed columnar NoSQL key-value pair based datastore for big data. With support for multiple nodes, node management, centralized control, replica management and fault tolerance. Implemented with GET(Query) and POST(entry) requests with persistent storage.  Architecture suitable for 'read once write consistently' type of applications.


Built the application from scratch with Python and NodeJS.

volunteer_work.title: Technical Resource
volunteer_work.description: I volunteer as a technical resource and teach Java classes to refugees, women and disenfranchised communities in Berlin.

volunteer_work.title: Mentor for WEST (Women Entering & Staying in Tech) Program
volunteer_work.description: Women Entering & Staying in Tech (WEST) helps more women enter & flourish in technical roles through 1:1 mentorships.
